long_description: The Emotion Kayaks Sparky sit-on-top kayak offers a comfortable, stable and fun way to introduce kids to kayaking. Emotion Kayaks Sparky sit-on-top kayak only weighs 22 lbs.! It's perfect for kids, teens and small paddlers of all abilities. Tough polyethylene hull stands up to abuse and offers years of service. Hull design offers excellent stability and limits rocking. Molded seat with multiple footrests offers a comfortable fit for kids of all sizes. Scupper holes drain excess water from cockpit. Side handles with finger grips on each side of kayak make transport easy, and toggled bow handle offers an convenient place to grab the boat. The Sparky includes a center cup holder and a small stern tankwell.
short_description: The Emotion Kayaks Sparky sit-on-top kayak offers a comfortable, stable and fun way to introduce kids to kayaking.
